title: Chesterfield Manor
description: Have you ever wanted to take part in murder mystery dinner, or a weekend for that matter? If so Chesterfield Manor is the place for you. Or so you think Bill and Sara thought so too.Bill and Sara have been married for nearly 3 years and have slowly been drifting apart. With their 3rd Anniversary quickly approaching Bill decided to do something extravagant and take his lovely wife and a couple of their friends away for the weekend. Not only does he take them away for the weekend he takes them to an extraordinary 19th century manor, Chesterfield Manor, for a murder mystery weekend. Arriving at the manor Bill, Sara and their friends find out they are in for than they bargained for. The murder mystery weekend is not what they envisioned when the events of the game switch from a fun filled game to the guests of the events running and fighting for their lives.So please join our guests at Chesterfield Manor the perfect setting for this thrilling murder mystery you will never forget.
author: Cory Gleisinger
